name: Lueur Remake
description:
Cire , you're the last light of this world, litterally
Find Mr BlackHole and try to convince him to free the light he absorbed

CONTROLS :

Q-D : Left and Right

Space : Jump

E : Interact with buttons and Mr BlackHole

Left Click : Fireball (Only with Cire)

A : Summon Small Cire

Game Artist : Alizée Nouvel

Game Programmer : Maxime Corby

This game was made for the devtober jam.
